titles.title: Regulatory Improvement Act of 2007
Regulatory Improvement Act of 2007
Regulatory Improvement Act of 2007
Regulatory Improvement Act of 2007
To amend title 5, United States Code, to authorize appropriations for the Administrative Conference of the United States through fiscal year 2011, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee .
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 110-390.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 244.

action.text: Ms. Sanchez, Linda T. moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3564.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 443.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Schiff moved that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendment.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on the motion to agree to the Senate amendment to H.R. 3564.

vote.text: On motion that the House suspend the rules and agree to the Senate amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

reference.label: text as House agree to Senate amendment

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/30/2008--Public Law. Regulatory Improvement Act of 2007 - Authorizes appropriations for the Administrative Conference of the United States for FY2009-FY2011.
